content.text: Hi! I just bought a new house with my partner!
Oh wow! Congrats! We are just starting to look at houses. I have a list of things we want in a house.
What are some of the things on your list?
We want a place with a big yard and an open floor plan. We also like to go on long hikes, so we need a house that is close to a trail.
That sounds awesome! I wish we had a big yard. We live in a small apartment right now.
I know what you mean. We lived in an apartment before too. It was nice to be close to everything, but we wanted more space.
Yeah, we are looking forward to having a yard. We can have a garden and cookout parties.
Those sound like so much fun! I can't wait to have a house of our own.
Me too! It's going to be a lot of work, but it will be worth it.
I know it will! And we'll have each other to help along the way
